shortDescription: includes/options.php in the motors-car-dealership-classified-listings (aka Motors - Car Dealer & Classified Ads) plugin through 1.4.0 for WordPress allows unauthenticated options changes.
vulnerabilityName: stylemixthemes motors_-_car_dealer\,_classifieds_\&_listing Insufficient Verification of Data Authenticity
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
